attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE WERE TOLD WE WOULD GET NEW BATHROOMS, NEW KITCHENS, NEW FIRES AND COMBI BOILERS, REWIRED AND BRICKED OUTSIDE, NONE OF THIS HAS BEEN DONE. AND NOW THE COUNCIL SAYS THERES NO MONEY LEFT TO DO THE REST OF THE COMMUNITYS AFTER DOING ALL OF THE BRICK HOUSES AND OUR CHAIRMANS PREFAB! THE REST OF US HAVE TO LIVE IN SUBSTANDARD HOUSES FOR THE SAME RENT!

rejection.details: Please do not write in capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
